verses.verse: Now it came to pass<WH1961> on the third<WH7992> day,<WH3117> that Esther<WH635> put on<WH3847> her royal<WH4438> apparel, and stood<WH5975> in the inner<WH6442> court<WH2691> of the king's<WH4428> house,<WH1004> over against<WH5227> the king's<WH4428> house:<WH1004> and the king<WH4428> sat<WH3427> upon<WH5921> his royal<WH4438> throne<WH3678> in the royal<WH4438> house,<WH1004> over against<WH5227> the gate<WH6607> of the house.<WH1004>

And the king<WH4428> said<WH559> unto Esther<WH635> at the banquet<WH4960> of wine,<WH3196> What<WH4100> is thy petition?<WH7596> and it shall be granted<WH5414> thee: and what<WH4100> is thy request?<WH1246> even to<WH5704> the half<WH2677> of the kingdom<WH4438> it shall be performed.<WH6213>
